p: Fieldwork in Brazil was carried out by TAMAR (Brazilian Sea Turtle Conservation Program) under the permit # 41987 from SISBIO (Authorization and Information System on Biodiversity), and the Chico Mendes Institute for Biodiversity Conservation (ICMBio)/Ministry of Environment (MMA). The ethics committee from SISBIO and ICMBio considered animal ethics issues related to the project and the experimental design, and specifically approved this study.
